SELECT d.fitting_code,c.code_value AS type,m.list_number,m. COMMENT,m.update_time,v3.user_name create_person, IF ( ISNULL(d.audit_count), d.apply_count, d.audit_count ) count, d.price,hx_fitting_detail.fitting_name,v.`name` send_company,v2.`name` receive_company FROM hx_material_manage m INNER JOIN hx_material_detail d ON m.list_number = d.list_number LEFT JOIN hx_organization_unload v ON v.id IS NOT NULL AND v.id = m.send_company LEFT JOIN hx_organization_unload v2 ON v2.id IS NOT NULL AND v2.id = m.receive_company LEFT JOIN hx_user_unload v3 on v3.user_login_name = m.create_person INNER JOIN hx_fitting_detail ON hx_fitting_detail.fitting_code = d.fitting_code INNER JOIN v_code c ON c.code_id = 'fitting_type' AND c.code_key = m.type AND m.list_number IN ( SELECT j.work_entity_id FROM JBPM4_TASK_TRAJECTTORY j LEFT JOIN hx_stock_inout_mapping sm ON j.process_definition_key = sm.`key` AND j.current_activity = sm.activity WHERE sm.`inout` = #{param.inout} AND sm.type = #{param.fittingPositionType} AND sm.is_new = #{param.isNew} AND sm.move_type= m.move_direction )
AND (m.send_company IN (${param.innerOrgs}))
AND (m.receive_company IN (${param.innerOrgs}))
AND m.list_number like CONCAT('%',#{param.listNumber},'%')
AND m.send_company like CONCAT('%',#{param.sendCompany},'%')
AND m.receive_company like CONCAT('%',#{param.receiveCompany},'%')
AND m.type = #{param.type}
AND hx_fitting_detail.parts_code like CONCAT('%',#{param.partsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND d.suit_model like CONCAT('%', #{param.suitModel}, '%')
AND d.fitting_code like CONCAT('%', #{param.fittingCode}, '%')
AND hx_fitting_detail.fitting_type = #{param.fittingType}
and DATE_FORMAT(m.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= #{param.ksrq}
and DATE_FORMAT(m.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= #{param.jsrq}
ORDER by m.update_time DESC
